attributes.action: reclassify the DWP description so that endometriosis is no longer described under the heading of Pelvic Inflammatory Disease
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DWP describes endometriosis as part of Pelvic Inflammatory Disease, a sexually transmitted disease. http://www.dwp.gov.uk/medical/med_conditions/minor/pelvic/
This information is completely incorrect. The cause of endometriosis is not known, but it is NOT sexually transmitted and you can NOT catch it. The DWP is perpetuating a damaging and uninformed myth that endometriosis sufferers have caused their own illness. It is irresponsible and insulting that the DWP portrays endometriosis in this way. We petition the government to categorise endometriosis under its own heading with correct information.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reclassify the DWP description so that endometriosis is no longer described under the heading of Pelvic Inflammatory Disease."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
